Items.Description: Getting to know C#. Learning to declare variables and perform arithmetic operations
Learn to use the Math library and improve the style of our code
Getting to know branching: conditional constructs, operators, and the bool type
Learn to work with loops: their types, syntax, and when to use them
Here we will learn how to work with arrays, what possibilities they offer, and how they combine with other constructs
Getting to know strings and mastering word processing skills
Learning to work with collections - lists and dictionaries
Getting to know the mechanism of recursion and learning how to use it correctly

Items.LevelTitle: On the way to the castle
Items.Description: Learn to sort collections in different ways
You will have to demonstrate everything you learned earlier
